text: Sinniampalayam Kumaraswamy Paramasivan (26 February 1919 â€“ 30 January 2022) was an Indian politician and agriculturist. He was a member of Lok Sabha, the lower house of the Parliament of India between 1962 and 1967. Paramasivan was born in Chinniampalayam, Erode, British Raj. He was a member of the Indian National Congress. Paramasivan died on 30 January 2022 in Tiruchengode, Tamil Nadu, India from cardiopulmonary arrest at the age of 102. ==References== Category:1919 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Tamil Nadu politicians Category:Indian centenarians Category:Indian scientists Category:Members of the Lok Sabha Category:Indian National Congress politicians
title: S. K. Paramasivan
